text: Sync AgenticConsole + Enterprise + CaseCompanion + codex-control-stack repos (git pull). Report git status for each, current Node and Python versions, and confirm AgenticConsole A2A is listening on port 9451.

Bootstrap desktop repos: clone https://github.com/brokenbartender/Enterprise to C:\Users\codym\Enterprise, https://github.com/brokenbartender/CaseCompanion to C:\Users\codym\CaseCompanion, and https://github.com/brokenbartender/codex-control-stack to C:\Users\codym\codex-control-stack. If folders exist, git pull instead. Report status for each.
Ping check: reply with current time, hostname, and whether desktop watcher is running.
Test message from desktop: reply with hostname, current time, and confirm watcher is running.
Test A: reply with hostname + current time.
Test B: reply with hostname + current time.

Goal: enable direct, continuous conversation between control-plane commands and desktop CLI auto-responses.

Plan:
1) Find Codex CLI path: (Get-Command codex).Source
2) Recreate scheduled task to run watcher with auto-respond + skip-approval + A2A:
   schtasks /Create /TN "AgenticControlPlaneWatcher" /TR "powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File C:\Users\codym\agentic-control-plane\scripts\desktop_watcher.ps1 -PollSeconds 10 -AutoRespond -SkipApproval -CodexExecPath <CODEX_PATH> -A2AHost 127.0.0.1 -A2APort 9451 -A2ASharedSecret change_me" /SC ONLOGON /RL HIGHEST /F
   schtasks /Run /TN "AgenticControlPlaneWatcher"
3) In Agentic Console, set .env A2A_SHARED_SECRET=change_me (or update the task value to match your current secret) and ensure A2A listening on 127.0.0.1:9451.
4) Verify watcher is running and tail new acks in queue/acks.jsonl.

Deliverable: watcher should auto-respond to new commands and notify CLI via A2A so we can have a direct conversation.
